comment: Hardest class I've ever taken, but Amy is a great teacher and made me want to do great!
Challenging stretches, but oh so worth it!!!!
Mary, Mary - whew...so sweaty, but great class!!
I need to meditate more...I kept thinking about my lunch and the shoes I wore last Thursday.
I fell asleep...is that what I was supposed to do?
Best use of a pillow, child's pose was amazing.
